sub_title: Pedagogisch en onderwijskundig onderzoeker en adviseur
summary: Als pedagogisch en onderwijskundig onderzoeker- en adviseur heb ik ervaring op het gebied van reken-wiskunde onderwijs, creativiteit, (hoog)begaafdheid, leerproblemen en professionalisering van leraren. Ik sla graag een brug tussen de wetenschap en onderwijspraktijk door in gesprek te gaan met anderen, theoretische kennis toe te passen en gebruik te maken van mijn analytische vaardigheden.

University', 'description': "Title of Doctoral Dissertation: 'Promoting creativity in elementary mathematics education'
Promotors: Prof. dr. Paul P.M. Leseman & Prof. Dr. Evelyn H. Kroesbergen

I was a PhD Candidate at the 3-year NRO-PPON funded MACE project (in Dutch 'Meetkunst’). The project aimed to promote students’ ability and creative ability in visual arts and geometry, by integrating both disciplines in primary school education. 
- I designed, organized and coordinated a pilot and large scale study in which the effects of the MACE program were investigated (N=150 classes, N=2900 4th, 5th and 6th grade students). Furthermore, I supervised 12 research assistants. 
- I designed the measurement instruments to evaluate the MACE program.
- Co-designer of the MACE teaching sequence and teacher professional development program in which I collaborated with teachers, museum employees, and teacher educators. My role was mainly to ensure that the program had a theoretical foundation. 
- I was a trainer in the MACE professional development program for teachers.", 'title': 'PHD Candidate', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Utrecht en omgeving, Nederland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Utrecht University', 'description': 'Bacherthesis supervisor/teacher at the bachelor program pedagogical sciences', 'title': 'Teacher', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Utrecht', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Utrecht University', 'description': "As a research assistant of Dr. E.H. I have had experience with children that were gifted, had dyscalculia, dyslexia, fear of failure and/or ADHD. 

I took interviews with parents, (neuro)pscyhological tests and surveys, intelligence tests  (WISC-III, RAKIT-2), did school observations and I investigated their mathematical and language ability.
